data.title: Lenk climate: Weather Lenk & temperature by month
data.text:
>>Weather by month // weather averages Lenk

>>Climate graph // Weather by Month Lenk

>>average temperature by month Lenk

>>Weather Lenk

In Lenk, the climate is cold and temperate. Lenk is a city with a significant rainfall. Even in the driest month there is a lot of rain. According to Köppen and Geiger, this climate is classified as Dfb. The temperature in this location is approximately 1.8 °C | 35.2 °F, as determined by statistical analysis. Precipitation here is about 2016 mm | 79.4 inch per year.

Lenk is located in the northern hemisphere. The balmy days of Summer commence at the end of June and conclude in September. This period encompasses the months: June, July, August, September.

Climate graph // Weather by Month Lenk

The driest month is October, with 130 mm | 5.1 inch of rainfall. Most of the precipitation here falls in July, averaging 224 mm | 8.8 inch.

Weather by month // weather averages Lenk

<>

Avg. Temperature °C (°F) Min. Temperature °C (°F) Max. Temperature °C (°F) Precipitation / Rainfall mm (in) Humidity (%) Rainy days (d) avg. Sun hours (hours)

January February March April May June July August September October November December

Data: 1991 - 2021 Min. Temperature °C (°F), Max. Temperature °C (°F), Precipitation / Rainfall mm (in), Humidity, Rainy days. Data: 1999 - 2019: avg. Sun hours

The difference in precipitation between the driest month and the wettest month is 94 mm | 4 inch. Throughout the year, temperatures vary by 19.7 °C | 35.5 °F.

The month with the highest relative humidity is September (80.74 %). The month with the lowest relative humidity is March (75.77 %). The wettest month is July (19.73 days). The driest month is February (12.20 days).

Lenk weather and climate for every month

Hours of sunshine in Lenk

avg. hours of sun

Total hours of sun

In this location, the month that receives most sunshine is June, with a mean number of daily hours being 8.36. Across the entire duration of said calendar period there are an aggregate total of 259.26 hours' worth of sunlight.

In Lenk, the month that experiences the least number of daily sunshine hours is January with an average duration of 4.79 hours per day. The total amount of sunlight recorded during this period in question stands at a sum total of 148.4.

In Lenk, an average of 79.83 hours of sunshine are counted per month and around 2430.15 hours throughout the year.

Airport close to Lenk

The closest Airports of Lenk are: Bern Airport (BRN) 50.90km,Geneva International Airport (GVA) 105.58km,EuroAirport Basel-Mulhouse-Freiburg (BSL) 127.36km

You can reach Lenk from this Cities by Plane: London (LCY), Athens (ATH), Copenhagen (CPH), Vienna (VIE), Paris (ORY), Edinburgh (EDI), Hamburg (HAM), Cologne (CGN), Oslo (OSL), Alicante (ALC), Liverpool (LPL), Málaga (AGP), Beijing (PEK), Faro (FAO), Funchal (FNC), Porto (OPO), Casablanca (CMN), Stockholm (ARN), Kyiv (KBP), Minsk (MSQ)
